content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: While discussing your personal character is irrelevant here, let me engage in the negotiation regarding the rental price for the apartment in Magdeburg. To start, I may propose a higher-than-expected price. Farhad, I suggest a rental price of 1200 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the proposed price. However, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my budget is significantly lower as a student.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
